page.title: 14MRS WATKINS OF DEFYNNOG
page.content: I wake to a cup of tea at 7.15 am. I wash, dress and get the children their breakfast. At 8.40 am I leave for work with the rest of the family.,I drop the chidren off at school and go to Brecon with my husband. Once in Brecon I collect the weeks shoping. At 10.50 am I teach physics to the 3rd yrs then I have a sandwich lunch, at 1.00 pm I have a computer class. From 1.45 pm to 3.05 pm I teach physics to the 4th yrs. Then I collect the children from school, return home, unpack the shoping, and start cooking tea. After tea I watch a bit of T.V.. At 8.00 pm I send the children up to get ready for bed, the light goes out at 9.00 pm. I go to bed at 11.00 pm sharp. (27/6/85 L. Watkins) (Transcribed by Thomas Watkins)
